name: trainsaver
title: trainsaver
description:
Creates a dynamic screensaver which follows trains from station to station 
 It will start automatically if player is afk, and can be toggled on/off with a hotkey (default cmd/ctrl + t)  
 The commands /trainsaver and /end-trainsaver are also available 
 Options are configurable in player mod settings
author: asher_sky
